The claim was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and has been shared more than 150 times.
The post states that doctors at the Nati: NTUH) found that COVID-19 is a combination of SARS and AIDS, and provides details about the characteristics of COVID-19 and its impact on the immune system.
The NTUH issued a statement on April 13: 2020, denying that these comments came from their doctors and urged people not to believe or share the rumor.
The Taiwanese fact: check organization, MyGoPen, published a report debunking the hoax and advised the public to obtain the latest information from the Taiwan Center for Disease Control website. The official website of the Taiwan Centers for Disease Control does not mention COVID-19 as a combination of AIDS and SARS.
